name: RectangleTest
description: Unit tests for the Rectangle class, focusing on various geometric operations and properties.

test_cases.name: testDistanceToSelfIsZero
test_cases.description: Tests that the distance from a rectangle to itself is zero.

test_cases.name: testXParametersWrongOrderThrowsException
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when the x-parameters are in the wrong order.

test_cases.name: testYParametersWrongOrderThrowsException
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when the y-parameters are in the wrong order.

test_cases.name: testDistanceToOverlapIsZero
test_cases.description: Tests that the distance between two overlapping rectangles is zero.

test_cases.name: testDistanceWhenSeparatedByXOnly
test_cases.description: Tests the distance between two rectangles separated only by the x-axis.

test_cases.name: testDistanceWhenSeparatedByXOnlyAndOverlapOnY
test_cases.description: Tests the distance between two rectangles separated only by the x-axis but overlapping on the y-axis.

test_cases.name: testDistanceWhenSeparatedByDiagonally
test_cases.description: Tests the distance between two rectangles separated diagonally.

test_cases.name: testInequalityWithNull
test_cases.description: Tests that a rectangle is not equal to null.

test_cases.name: testSimpleEquality
test_cases.description: Tests simple equality between two identical rectangles.

test_cases.name: testSimpleInEquality1
test_cases.description: Tests inequality between two rectangles with different y-max values.

test_cases.name: testSimpleInEquality2
test_cases.description: Tests inequality between two rectangles with different x-min values.

test_cases.name: testSimpleInEquality3
test_cases.description: Tests inequality between two rectangles with different y-min values.

test_cases.name: testSimpleInEquality4
test_cases.description: Tests inequality between two rectangles with different x-max values.

test_cases.name: testGeometry
test_cases.description: Tests that the geometry method returns the same rectangle.

test_cases.name: testIntersects
test_cases.description: Tests that two rectangles intersect.

test_cases.name: testIntersectsNoRectangleContainsCornerOfAnother
test_cases.description: Tests that two rectangles intersect without one containing a corner of the other.

test_cases.name: testIntersectsOneRectangleContainsTheOther
test_cases.description: Tests that one rectangle contains the other and they intersect.

test_cases.name: testIntersectsOneRectangleReturnsTrueDespiteZeroArea
test_cases.description: Tests that two rectangles intersect even if one has zero area.

test_cases.name: testContains
test_cases.description: Tests that a rectangle contains a point within its bounds.

test_cases.name: testContainsReturnsFalseWhenLessThanMinY
test_cases.description: Tests that a rectangle does not contain a point with y less than its min y.

test_cases.name: testContainsReturnsFalseWhenGreaterThanMaxY
test_cases.description: Tests that a rectangle does not contain a point with y greater than its max y.

test_cases.name: testContainsReturnsFalseWhenGreaterThanMaxX
test_cases.description: Tests that a rectangle does not contain a point with x greater than its max x.

test_cases.name: testContainsReturnsFalseWhenLessThanMinX
test_cases.description: Tests that a rectangle does not contain a point with x less than its min x.

test_cases.name: testIntersectionAreWhenEqual
test_cases.description: Tests the intersection area of two identical rectangles.

test_cases.name: testIntersectionAreaWhenDontIntersect
test_cases.description: Tests the intersection area of two non-intersecting rectangles.

test_cases.name: testIntersectionAreaCornerIntersect
test_cases.description: Tests the intersection area of two rectangles intersecting at a corner.

test_cases.name: testIntersectionAreaTopIntersect
test_cases.description: Tests the intersection area of two rectangles intersecting at the top.
